title: The Break with tradition
creator_credit: Leslie Ann Nathan, Eve Cotton and Center for Humanities
brief_description: This program introduces viewers to the origins of modern art - a change from art representing reality to art for art’s sake. It explains one of the most revolutionary aspects of impressionist painting - the use of colour - as seen in the works of Monet, Pissarro and Renoir.
